text: Va Muhammad cuz firistodae nest, ki pes az u [niz] firistodagone [ʙudand va] guzastand. Ojo agar u ʙimirad jo kusta savad, ʙa aqiʙ ʙozmegarded [va dini xudro raho mekuned]? Va har ki [az aqidai rostini xud] ʙozgardad, [ʙidonad, ki] hargiz ʙa Alloh taolo zijone namerasonad va [ʙa zudi] Alloh taolo siposguzoronro podos xohad dod
